verbs.description: [ARG0: red sox] [V: win] [ARG1: rivalry with yankees advance to alcs] [ARGM-PRP: for matchup with astros] the red sox move on to the alcs to face the houston astros in a matchup of clubs with mlb two best regular - season records chris sale eduardo nunez alex cora boston astros red sox sox andrew benintendi houston astros rick porcello aaron boone ian kinsler new york new york yankees sabathia boston red sox yankees
